entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
